Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity

Class EntityPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.EntityPool

  • public class EntityPool
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of uniquely-identified "component-bag" entities. 
     Events received:
 Events.CREATE - creates an entity (Iterable<Component>)
 Events.DESTROY - destroys an entity (Entity)

 Events emitted:
 Events.CREATED - when an entity is created (Entity)
 Events.DESTROYED - when an entity is destroyed (Entity)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EntityPool​(EventBroadcaster events)
      Constructs an empty entity pool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Entity create​(Component... components)
      Constructs a new entity from a collection of components and adds it to the entity pool.
      Entity create​(java.lang.Iterable<Component> components)
      Constructs a new entity from a collection of components and adds it to the entity pool.
      boolean destroy​(Entity entity)
      Removes an entity from the entity pool.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Entity> get​(Signature signature, java.util.Comparator<Entity> comparator)
      Returns a stream over all entities with a signature subset matching signature.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.stream.Stream<Entity> get​(Signature signature,
                                           java.util.Comparator<Entity> comparator)
        Returns a stream over all entities with a signature subset matching signature.
        Parameters:
        signature - signature defining a set of component types
        comparator - comparator defining entity order, null results in no sorting
        Returns:
        all entities with a signature subset matching signature

        Constructs a new entity from a collection of components and adds it to the entity pool.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        created entity

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • destroy

        public boolean destroy​(Entity entity)
        Removes an entity from the entity pool.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to destroy
        Returns:
        true if the entity pool contained entity and it was removed
